Yes! Here are some additional tips to make your matcha latte even more delicious:

1. Use high-quality matcha powder: The quality of matcha powder can significantly impact the taste of your latte. Opt for high-quality matcha powder that is ceremonial grade or culinary grade for a smoother taste and better quality.

2. Use a frother: Using a milk frother or a blender can create a smooth, creamy texture for your matcha latte.

3. Experiment with milk alternatives: You can use any type of milk or milk alternative, such as almond, soy, or oat milk. Almond and coconut milk can give your latte a nutty flavor, while oat milk provides a smooth, creamy texture.

4. Add flavors: You can add flavors like vanilla extract, cinnamon, or nutmeg to your matcha latte to make it even more delicious.

5. Sweeten it up: Adding a sweetener like honey, maple syrup, or agave syrup can add more flavor and sweetness to your matcha latte. 

6. Experiment with Iced Matcha Latte: You can also make an iced matcha latte by chilling the Matcha after whisking it well, then adding ice and milk, and giving it a good stir. Adding a little bit of fresh lemon juice to iced Matcha latte can make it even more refreshing. 

I hope you try these tips and enjoy your matcha latte at home!
